title: BitDefender Internet Security 2016 + 6 Months License
description:
BitDefender Internet Security 2016 + 6 Months License Key Giveaway

BitDefender Internet Security capitalizes on live and virtualized behavior-based detection, in addition to cloud-based services, to stop emerging e-threats that other products miss. The product won "Best Anti-Vuris 2015" awarded by PC Magazine, outperforming the competition by having the highest overall score in protection, repair and unsability.


The latest version, BitDefender Internet Security 2016 continues to build on BitDefender's history of top protection and performance, ease-of-use and unique user experience. It integrades Anti-Virus, Anti-SPAM, Anti-Phishing, Two-Way Firewall, Social Networking Safeguards and a suite of State-of-the-Art maintenance and optimization tools into the perfect silent security solution for internet-connected families.


To defeat Ransomware, BitDefender prefents untrusted applications from deleting or modifying your work documents, pictures, music or video in popular user folders. In dual-layer protection, Ransomware Behavioral Detection (RBD) als analyzes all applications for activity associated with Ransomware and blocks any application that is taking steps to lock down your data. BitDefender's advancements allow it to process vast quantities of data worldwide in miliseconds to identify and neutralize new threats before they have a chance to spread. And the new Firewall offers superior performance in pinpointing intrusions, effectively, filtering incoming and outgoing traffic, even over a WI-FI Network.


BitDefender has furthered it's "ease of use" policy with the new BitDefender Central, the console that allows users to manage accounts, subscriptions and remote devices and provide instant access to support. To simplify the journey from purchase to using BitDefender 2016 consumer line, products downloaded from BitDefender Central Accounts come pre-activated with the subscription and already linked to the customer's account. The One-Click Security concept deploys features with a single click to keep your system running at top speed. One-Click Optimizer keeps your system running at top speed and the exclusive technology of BitDefender Photon gradually molds itself to your system to visibly improve system performanxce. Auto-Pilot, crafted frtom "BitDefender's Decade of Experience" in the "Fight Against Malware", automatically takes the best security decisions for you so you can focus on the task at hand. However, you may also take advantage of the BitDefender serttings to fine-tune and improve your protection.


BitDefender Internet Security 2016 Free 6 Months License Key
BitDefender Internet Security 2016 is priced at 69.95$ for one year license key/serial number on up to 3 PC's. But as part of the promo offer by BitDefender, users can use the Award winning software absolutely for free for 6 months (half year). Offer valid for a limited time only, which means it's probably best to grab the goods while the offer is still live.


To get your free license ket of BitDefender Internet Security 2016, please visit the promo page that is given in the READ ME.txt that comes with download this torrent.


License key and download link will then be sent to you by E-mail. If the license E-mail hasn't arrived within 30 minutes after you submit your details, please check your SPAM, Promotions or Junk Mail Folder to locate it. Please follow the steps in that E-mail for guidance
